text: GeniyActors of Soviet Cinema Gavrilovich "Gennadi" Yukhtin (30 March 1932 – 18 February 2022) was a Soviet and Russian actor. He was born in Kinelsky District, Kuibyshev region, USSR. His career began in 1955. His best known roles were in The Rumyantsev Case, Spring on Zarechnaya Street and Ballad of a Soldier. Yukhtin tested positive for COVID-19 on 27 January 2022. He was hospitalised on 11 February in critical condition in Moscow.89-летняя звезда фильма «Неуловимые мстители» Геннадий Юхтин был госпитализирован He died a week later on 18 February 2022, at the age of 89.Умер актер Геннадий Юхтин, игравший в "Весне на Заречной улице" ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Actors from Moscow Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow
title: Gennadi Yukhtin
